links: Eduardo H. M. Brietzke, Generalization of an identity of Andrews, Fibonacci Quart. 44 (2006), no. 2, 166-171.
prog: (Haskell)a034871 n = a034871_list !! na034871_list = concat $ map ([1,1] ^) [1,3..]instance Num a => Num [a] where   fromInteger k = [fromInteger k]   (p:ps) + (q:qs) = p + q : ps + qs   ps + qs         = ps ++ qs   (p:ps) * qs'@(q:qs) = p * q : ps * qs' + [p] * qs   _ * _               = []-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 02 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
